name: Neons
description:
This is a project born during a game jam of 3 days, the theme was "local multiplier" 

Neons's a party game based on the concept of snake in which players have to collect as many collectibles as possible to make their trail bigger, while avoiding colliding with someone else's trail.

You have the possibility to  choose to play with 2, 3 or 4 players

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls :

An xbox controller it's required to play the game

A to validate or activate a power (when you have 5 orbs)

B to cancel

Left stick to move

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Feel free to give any feedbacks

Hope you like it ;)
